name: Trapped in one room
description:
LudumDare Entry

An interactive & narrative story.

A man wake up in a room after a car crash.

Is he free to go or trapped inside ?

The story is largely unfinished, but some features are here.

I don't have time to make a translation, so all dialogue are in french ( and i'm sorry for that : i will post an translation soon)

Tools used :

Framework : Unity + https://github.com/Baste-RainGames/Node_Editor (very good tool)

Audio : microphone & frutty loops

Graphism : Inkscape, Gimp, MagicaVoxel
